channel.description: Recent content in open source on

item.title: New Blog & Hiring Needs
item.description: Well I failed badly in my mission to blog every week of 2017. I guess life and stuff just got in the way in the end. I’ll try to be more consistent in the second half of 2018.

item.title: On Hiring: Developers Are Like Stocks
item.description: This post is for those of you who hire developers, and also junior developers who want to be hired. Letâ€™s talk about how developers are just like individual stocks in the stock market.

item.title: Interview with InfoQ on SimplSockets
item.description: Jonathan Allen of InfoQconducted an interview with me about one of my open source initiatives, SimplSockets. We discussed the value of TCP over HTTP and why Sockets are still relevant to programming.
